headline.print_headline: Pick 6: Coaches on the Hot Seat Entering 2014
headline.main: Pick 6: Coaches on the Hot Seat Entering 2014

docs.snippet: Coaches often say they are always on the hot seat. That might be true, but some seats are hotter than others....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coaches often say they are always on the hot seat. That might be true, but some seats are hotter than others.

headline.print_headline: Egypt: Police Arrest Suspect in Rape of Briton
headline.main: Egypt: Police Arrest Suspect in Rape of Briton

docs.snippet: Egyptian authorities arrested a man on Saturday who is suspected of raping a British citizen in a banana plantation near the ancient southern city of Luxor, a security official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Egyptian authorities arrested a man on Saturday who is suspected of raping a British citizen in a banana plantation near the ancient southern city of Luxor, a security official said.

headline.print_headline: 2 Stabbed to Death Outside Texas Skating Rink
headline.main: 2 Stabbed to Death Outside Texas Skating Rink

docs.snippet: Two men were stabbed to death and several other people wounded in a fight early Saturday outside a North Texas roller skating rink, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two men were stabbed to death and several other people wounded in a fight early Saturday outside a North Texas roller skating rink, officials said.

headline.print_headline: United Need to Learn to Cope With Pressure Says Van Gaal
headline.main: United Need to Learn to Cope With Pressure Says Van Gaal

docs.snippet: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal said his team need to learn to cope with pressure after they slumped to a 2-1 home defeat to Swansea City on the opening day of the Premier League season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal said his team need to learn to cope with pressure after they slumped to a 2-1 home defeat to Swansea City on the opening day of the Premier League season.

headline.print_headline: Hemp Homecoming: Rebirth Sprouts in Kentucky
headline.main: Hemp Homecoming: Rebirth Sprouts in Kentucky

docs.snippet: Call it a homecoming for hemp: Marijuana's non-intoxicating cousin is undergoing a rebirth in a state at the forefront of efforts to reclaim it as a mainstream crop....
docs.lead_paragraph: Call it a homecoming for hemp: Marijuana's non-intoxicating cousin is undergoing a rebirth in a state at the forefront of efforts to reclaim it as a mainstream crop.

headline.print_headline: Switzerland's Raiffeisen Eyes Firms Managing Assets Up to 20 Billion Pounds
headline.main: Switzerland's Raiffeisen Eyes Firms Managing Assets Up to 20 Billion Pounds

docs.snippet: Swiss lender Raiffeisen is open to making acquisitions in private banking and asset management, potentially targeting firms handling assets of 20 billion to 30 billion Swiss francs (19.90 billion pounds), its chief was quoted as saying on Saturday...
docs.lead_paragraph: Swiss lender Raiffeisen is open to making acquisitions in private banking and asset management, potentially targeting firms handling assets of 20 billion to 30 billion Swiss francs (19.90 billion pounds), its chief was quoted as saying on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: California Water Bond Won't Be a Drought-Buster
headline.main: California Water Bond Won't Be a Drought-Buster

docs.snippet: Despite its size, the $7.5 billion water plan on the November ballot will not solve the problems created by the drought nor is it expected to prevent rationing during future droughts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite its size, the $7.5 billion water plan on the November ballot will not solve the problems created by the drought nor is it expected to prevent rationing during future droughts.

docs.snippet: With "selfies" and hugs, Pope Francis connects with Asian youth in South Korea. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: With "selfies" and hugs, Pope Francis connects with Asian youth in South Korea. Jillian Kitchener reports.

headline.print_headline: Woman Reported Dead During Michigan Flood Is Alive
headline.main: Woman Reported Dead During Michigan Flood Is Alive

docs.snippet: A woman who city officials said died in massive flooding this week in the Detroit area has a message to share....
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who city officials said died in massive flooding this week in the Detroit area has a message to share.

headline.print_headline: Suicide Bomber Attacks U.N. Base in Northern Mali, Kills Two
headline.main: Suicide Bomber Attacks U.N. Base in Northern Mali, Kills Two

docs.snippet: Two U.N. peacekeepers were killed and nine others injured in a suicide attack on a patrol base in northern Mali, the U.N. peacekeeping mission (MINUSMA) said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two U.N. peacekeepers were killed and nine others injured in a suicide attack on a patrol base in northern Mali, the U.N. peacekeeping mission (MINUSMA) said on Saturday.
